name: oso-serverless-authorizer
description: This repository demonstrates a working implementation of Oso in an AWS Lambda context using TypeScript, and being deployed with Serverless Framework.

scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run create:folders && tsc && npm run copy:files && npm run copy:modules && npm run zip
scripts.copy:files: cp package.json build && cp policy.polar build
scripts.copy:modules: cp -R node_modules/oso build/node_modules && cp -R node_modules/lodash.isequal build/node_modules
scripts.zip: cd build && zip -r authorizer.zip . && cd .. && mv build/authorizer.zip .

author: Mikael Vesavuori
